name: Dependencywheel
tagline: A package dependency visualization using d3.js. Currently supports Composer for PHP.
body: Dependency Wheel ================ This experiment visualizes package dependencies using an interactive disc. Each disc section represents a dependency, and links between arcs materialize these dependencies. All rendering is done client-side, in JavaScript. Built with d3.js, published with the MIT open-source license. Interact with DependencyWheels, see examples, and build your own at [http://fzaninotto.github.com/DependencyWheel](http://fzaninotto.github.com/DependencyWheel). ![The Dependency Wheel of the sylius/sylius project](http://redotheweb.com/DependencyWheel/img/dependency_chord.gif)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
